title: Looking to recreate similar style logo as Blacksmith in photo any ideas would be most helpful
author: Bubba J.

comments.content:
Try posting your request in the font ID forum [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415235958/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")  
I trust you will get some good suggestions as to blackletter fonts you could use as a basis for your logo project.  
Don

Hey Don, I had tried typeid with no response, thought I would give design a try because of embellishments done to font. Thank you for the Blackletter font direction. I did find some very close, but not exact matches.  
Thanks for your help.  
Bubba J.
